info.headline: Severe Weather Statement issued June 08 at 5:54PM CDT until June 08 at 10:00PM CDT by NWS Huntsville
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 630 PM CDT FOR FRANKLIN AND SOUTHERN LAWRENCE COUNTIES... At 553 PM CDT, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from near Town Creek to near Russellville to 8 miles southwest of Belgreen, moving southeast at 15 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. Locations impacted include... Russellville, Moulton, Red Bay, Phil Campbell, Belgreen, Vina, Hodges, Mt Hope, Cedar Creek Reservoir and Atwood. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
